trans-unit.source: Presents [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] window.
trans-unit.target: 呈現[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]內容中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]視窗。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Many members of this class are unavailable in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> 網際網路安全性區域中，就無法使用這個類別的成員多。

trans-unit.source: An HwndSource implements a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window that can contain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: HwndSource 實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]可以包含視窗[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]內容。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content in the window is arranged, measured, and rendered; and is interactive to input.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]排列在視窗的內容，以測量，並呈現; 互動輸入。

trans-unit.source: Because the HwndSource is specifically designed to interoperate with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)], this class exposes several low-level [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] features.
trans-unit.target: 因為 HwndSource 專為相互作用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]，這個類別會公開數個低階[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]功能。

trans-unit.source: You can use this class to do the following: - Specify window styles, window class styles, and extended window styles.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別執行下列動作:-指定的視窗樣式，視窗類別樣式，並延伸的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: - Hook the window procedure.
trans-unit.target: -連結的視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: - Provide access to the window handle (HWND).
trans-unit.target: -提供的視窗控制代碼 (HWND) 的存取。

trans-unit.source: - Destroy the window.
trans-unit.target: -終結視窗。

trans-unit.source: The HwndSource class is designed for general interoperability and is not designed as a managed HWND wrapper.
trans-unit.target: HwndSource 類別一般的互通性所設計，並不是設計為受管理的 HWND 包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: In general, it does not provide managed methods for manipulating the window or properties for inspecting its state.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，它不提供管理視窗或屬性來檢查其狀態的 managed 的方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the HwndSource class provides access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window handle (HWND) through the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Handle%2A> property, which can be passed by means of PInvoke techniques to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in order to manipulate the window.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，HwndSource 類別提供的存取權[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]視窗控制代碼 (HWND) 透過<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Handle%2A>屬性，可以透過 PInvoke 技術，以傳遞[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]才能操作視窗。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Construction** Many aspects of the HwndSource can only be specified at construction time.
trans-unit.target: **建構**只能在建構階段指定的 HwndSource 許多層面。

trans-unit.source: To create an HwndSource, first create an <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> structure and populate it with the desired parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的 HwndSource，請先建立<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>結構，並填入所需的參數。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: These parameters include the following: - The class, window, and extended window styles.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數包括下列:-類別、 視窗和延伸的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: You must use PInvoke to change the styles after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更樣式 視窗建立之後，您必須使用 PInvoke。

trans-unit.source: Not all styles can be changed after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立視窗之後，就可以變更並非所有的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Consult the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] documentation before changing window styles.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]之前變更視窗樣式的文件。

trans-unit.source: - The initial position of the window.
trans-unit.target: 的視窗初始位置。

trans-unit.source: - The initial size of the window, which includes whether the size is specified or should be determined from the determined size of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: -初始大小的視窗，其中包含指定的大小，或應該由決定的大小是否[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]內容。

trans-unit.source: - The parent window.
trans-unit.target: 為父視窗。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook> to include in the window procedure chain.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook>要納入的視窗程序鏈結。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceHook>

trans-unit.source: If you specify a hook at construction time, it receives all messages for the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在建構時指定攔截程序，它會接收視窗的所有訊息。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> to add a hook after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>視窗建立後新增攔截程序。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The transparency settings.
trans-unit.target: -投影片的設定。

trans-unit.source: A top-level window can be configured to blend with the other windows on the desktop according to the per-pixel transparency of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: 最上層視窗可以設定為根據的每個像素透明度桌面上其他視窗與混合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]內容。

trans-unit.source: To enable this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.UsesPerPixelOpacity%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用此功能，設定<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.UsesPerPixelOpacity%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.UsesPerPixelOpacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be specified at construction time, and only through the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29> constructor signature, and it imposes several limitations.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只能指定，在建構階段，而且只能透過<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29>建構函式簽章，並會加諸幾項限制。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29>

trans-unit.source: After you populate the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> structure, pass it to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29> constructor for the HwndSource.
trans-unit.target: 之後您填入<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>結構時，請將它傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29>建構函式的 HwndSource。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters%29> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: **Object Lifetime** An HwndSource is a regular [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, and its lifetime is managed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: **物件存留期**HwndSource 為一般[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]物件和其存留期受記憶體回收行程。

trans-unit.source: Because the HwndSource represents an unmanaged resource, HwndSource implements <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: HwndSource HwndSource 表示 unmanaged 的資源，因為實作<xref:System.IDisposable>.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Synchronously calling <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A> immediately destroys the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window if called from the owner thread.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>會立即終結[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]如果擁有者執行緒從呼叫的視窗。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: If called from another thread, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window is destroyed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果已從另一個執行緒，呼叫[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]視窗終結時以非同步的方式。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A> explicitly from the interoperating code might be necessary for certain interoperation scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>明確地從之間互通性程式碼可能需要某些互通的案例。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Window Procedures** The HwndSource class implements its own window procedure.
trans-unit.target: **視窗程序**HwndSource 類別會實作自己的視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: This window procedure is used to process important window messages, such as those related to layout, rendering, and input.
trans-unit.target: 這個視窗程序是用來處理重要的視窗訊息，例如與配置、 呈現和輸入。

trans-unit.source: However, you can also hook the window procedure for your own use.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您也可以攔截的視窗程序供自己使用。

trans-unit.source: You can specify your own hook during construction by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.HwndSourceHook%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, or you can also use <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RemoveHook%2A> to add and remove hooks after the window is created.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定在建構期間指定您自己的攔截<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.HwndSourceHook%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，或者您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RemoveHook%2A>新增和移除勾點之後建立的視窗。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RemoveHook%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.AddHook%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.HwndSourceHook%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The hooks are called by last-in first-out order, which enables your hooks to execute before the built-in processing.
trans-unit.target: 後進先出順序，可讓您攔截程序執行內建處理之前會呼叫攔截程序。

trans-unit.source: The actual hooks are held by a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: 實際的攔截程序會依弱式參考保留。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, make sure that you manage the lifetime of your hook delegate.
trans-unit.target: 因此，請確定您管理您的攔截程序委派的存留期。

trans-unit.source: For more information about HwndSource and other interoperation classes, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有關 HwndSource 和互通性的其他類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 和 Win32 互通](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Notice how the constructors for HwndSource take parameters that resemble the parameters for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] functions such as [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462).
trans-unit.target: 請注意如何 HwndSource 的建構函式會採用類似的參數的參數[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]函式，如[CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=98462)。

trans-unit.source: Scale transformations should not be applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A> of an HwndSource.
trans-unit.target: 縮放轉換不應該套用至<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>的 HwndSource。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.RootVisual%2A> ，請參閱 < 備註 >

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> class by using a structure that contains the initial settings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref>類別使用包含的初始設定的結構。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This method is not available in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> 網際網路安全性區域不提供這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This constructor signature might be more convenient in certain situations, because the default structure contains some appropriate initial default values.
trans-unit.target: 此建構函式簽章可能在某些情況下，更方便，因為預設的結構包含某些適當的初始預設值。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If you use this signature, do not use the default <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> constructor to construct the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> structure for the `parameters` value.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您使用此簽章，不會使用預設<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>建構函式來建構<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>結構`parameters`值。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> constructor that enables you to specify an initial window name.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>建構函式，可讓您指定 [初始] 視窗的名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: If you use the default <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters> constructor and create an <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> with it, that <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> does not display because an initial window name is a construction requirement for the represented HWND.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用預設<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>建構函式，並建立<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>的<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>不會顯示因為初始的視窗名稱是否代表 HWND 建構需求。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters>

trans-unit.source: A structure that contains the parameters that are required to create the window.
trans-unit.target: 結構，包含建立視窗所需的參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> class with a specified class style, style, extended style, x-y position, name, and parent window.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref>使用指定的類別樣式、 樣式，擴充樣式、 x，y 位置、 名稱和父視窗類別。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This method is not available in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> 網際網路安全性區域不提供這個方法。
